Articles.Content:
Just wondering what plans does Squad have regarding the second space center: could it be that we'll see a multiplayer mode where the two players work one against the other in a somewhat nostalgic space race? Maybe with different goals or milestones, like first kerbals into orbit, first ones to reach the Mun, first Dunian probes...

We're just speculating here, I just liked the idea of competing against someone else's space program, with no time or resources to waste. It would be quite a thrilling experience.

Of course this doesn't mean a co-op mode between space programs wouldn't be awesome too
